plentry.pd: (1): Document scenario. Prioritizes screen sharing video quality and reduces latency on the receiving end. Suitable for sharing documents, slides, and spreadsheets.
(2): Gaming scenario. Prioritizes screen sharing smoothness. Suitable for sharing game screens.
(3): Video scenario. Prioritizes screen sharing smoothness. Suitable for sharing movies or live videos.
(4): Remote control scenario. Prioritizes screen sharing video quality and reduces latency on the receiving end. Suitable for sharing desktops of remotely controlled devices.
(1): Document scenario. Prioritizes screen sharing video quality and reduces video latency on the receiver side. Suitable for sharing documents, slides, and spreadsheets.
(2): Gaming scenario. Prioritizes screen sharing smoothness. Suitable for sharing games.
(3): Video scenario. Prioritizes screen sharing smoothness. Suitable for sharing movies or live video.
